import React from 'react' import classes from './adminDashboard.module.css' const AdminDashboard=(props)=> { const customersHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/getCustomers") } const sellersHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/getSellers") } const AddHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/addMetadataFields") } return (

Your Account

Get Sellers

) } export default AdminDashboard
